contents:
這只是給與警告麼？還好~

調查發現，超過三分之一的VPN被六家中國公司秘密擁有。

這篇文章把中國控制的VPN具體品牌說得更詳細：
https://www.computerweekly.com/news/252466203/Top-VPNs-secretly-owned-by-Chinese-firms?fbclid=IwAR3FUhZ5beQiKKjpPbxywPs4VP2PovAEF5VVw_RtTmstYwIu7AqJ1edGTPI


詳細圖解：[url=https://vpnpro.com/wp-content/uploads/VPN-owners-unveiled-97-VPN-products-run-by-just-23-companies-infographic.pdf?fbclid=IwAR32_W5rSwZsCkscPGd-nvm5KgBg47ti6YlaFj8tFvOSDMMmGLBVCe6Ep1Q][/url]https://vpnpro.com/wp-content/uploads/VPN-owners-unveiled-97-VPN-products-run-by-just-23-companies-infographic.pdf?fbclid=IwAR32_W5rSwZsCkscPGd-nvm5KgBg47ti6YlaFj8tFvOSDMMmGLBVCe6Ep1Q
